apps.name: Create Image
apps.description: Generate stunning images from text with 9 AI models
apps.longDescription: Create Image gives you access to 9 powerful AI image generation models in one place. From quick drafts with Flux.2 Flex to photorealistic masterpieces with GPT-5 Standard, choose the perfect model for your needs. Simply describe what you want to see, and watch AI bring your vision to life in seconds.

howItWorks.title: Describe your image
howItWorks.description: Type a detailed description of what you want to create

howItWorks.title: Choose a model
howItWorks.description: Select from 9 AI models based on speed vs quality

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: Click generate and get your image in seconds

howItWorks.title: Download or edit
howItWorks.description: Save your image or continue editing with prompts

apps.name: Chat Models
apps.description: Access 15 AI chat models in one place
apps.longDescription: Chat Models brings together 15 of the world's best AI assistants in a single, unified interface. Switch between GPT-5, Claude, Gemini, Llama, and more without juggling multiple subscriptions. From quick questions to deep research, find the perfect AI for every task.

howItWorks.title: Select a model
howItWorks.description: Choose from 15 AI models based on your needs

howItWorks.title: Start chatting
howItWorks.description: Type your question or request

howItWorks.title: Get instant answers
howItWorks.description: Receive streaming responses in real-time

howItWorks.title: Continue the conversation
howItWorks.description: Follow up with more questions

features.subtext: GPT-5, Claude, Gemini, Llama, and more

apps.name: Photoshoot
apps.longDescription: Photoshoot transforms your simple product photos into professional studio-quality images. Upload any product image and let AI place it in beautiful, realistic settings. Perfect for e-commerce, marketing, and social media. No photographer or studio needed.

howItWorks.title: Upload your product
howItWorks.description: Upload a clear photo of your product (PNG or JPG)

howItWorks.title: Choose a style
howItWorks.description: Select a background style or describe your own

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: AI creates a professional product photo

howItWorks.title: Download
howItWorks.description: Get your studio-quality image ready for use

features.subtext: Choose from presets or describe your own

apps.name: Product Ads
apps.longDescription: Product Ads creates scroll-stopping marketing visuals from your product photos. Upload your product, add your brand colors and messaging, and get ready-to-use ad creatives in seconds. Perfect for social media ads, banners, and promotional content.

howItWorks.title: Upload your product
howItWorks.description: Add your product image

howItWorks.title: Add your branding
howItWorks.description: Include colors, logo, and messaging

howItWorks.title: Select a style
howItWorks.description: Choose an ad template or style

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: Get marketing-ready visuals instantly

apps.name: Text to 3D
apps.longDescription: Text to 3D converts your text descriptions into fully-formed 3D models. Powered by Hunyuan3D-v3, create detailed 3D assets for games, AR/VR, product visualization, and more. Export in standard formats compatible with all 3D software.

howItWorks.title: Describe your object
howItWorks.description: Type a detailed description of the 3D model you want

howItWorks.title: Choose quality
howItWorks.description: Select normal, lowpoly, or geometry mode

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: AI creates your 3D model in ~30 seconds

howItWorks.title: Export
howItWorks.description: Download in GLB, OBJ, or FBX format

apps.name: Image to 3D
apps.longDescription: Image to 3D transforms your 2D images into detailed 3D models. Upload a photo of any object and get a fully-textured 3D model ready for use. Ideal for product visualization, game development, and creative projects.

howItWorks.title: Upload an image
howItWorks.description: Upload a clear photo of the object

howItWorks.title: AI analyzes
howItWorks.description: The model understands depth and structure

howItWorks.title: Generate 3D
howItWorks.description: A full 3D model is created from the image

howItWorks.title: Export
howItWorks.description: Download in your preferred format

apps.name: Text to Video
apps.description: Transform your text prompts into stunning videos with AI
apps.longDescription: Text to Video brings your written ideas to life as moving visuals. Describe a scene, and AI generates a video clip that matches your vision. Perfect for content creators, marketers, and storytellers who need quick video content.

howItWorks.title: Write your scene
howItWorks.description: Describe what should happen in the video

howItWorks.title: Set parameters
howItWorks.description: Choose duration, style, and quality

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: AI creates your video clip

howItWorks.title: Download
howItWorks.description: Export in MP4 format

apps.name: Image to Video
apps.description: Animate your images into dynamic videos
apps.longDescription: Image to Video breathes life into your still images. Upload any photo and watch it transform into a moving video with realistic motion, camera movement, and effects. Turn product shots into engaging content or bring artwork to life.

howItWorks.title: Upload your image
howItWorks.description: Add any still photo or artwork

howItWorks.title: Describe the motion
howItWorks.description: Tell AI how you want it to move

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: Watch your image come to life

howItWorks.title: Download
howItWorks.description: Save your animated video

apps.name: Image Edit
apps.description: Edit and enhance images with AI-powered prompts
apps.longDescription: Image Edit lets you modify existing images using natural language. Want to change the background? Remove an object? Add something new? Just describe the edit you want, and AI makes it happen while keeping the rest of your image intact.

howItWorks.title: Upload your image
howItWorks.description: Add the photo you want to edit

howItWorks.title: Describe the edit
howItWorks.description: Tell AI what to change

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: AI applies your requested edit

howItWorks.title: Refine or download
howItWorks.description: Make more edits or save

apps.name: Face Swap
apps.description: Swap faces in photos with AI precision
apps.longDescription: Face Swap uses advanced AI to seamlessly swap faces between photos. Upload a source face and a target image, and AI handles the rest - matching lighting, skin tone, and expression for realistic results.

howItWorks.title: Upload source face
howItWorks.description: Add a clear photo of the face to use

howItWorks.title: Upload target image
howItWorks.description: Add the image where you want the face

howItWorks.title: Generate
howItWorks.description: AI swaps the faces seamlessly

howItWorks.title: Download
howItWorks.description: Save your swapped image

features.subtext: Swap multiple faces in one image
